ygData.messageBody:
On 24 Aug 2000 11:36:59 -0000, you wrote:

I know that you can put a shield on the pet but what's the point of
armour....unless your really encumbered and don't want to destroy it.

>Message: 1
> Date: Thu, 24 Aug 2000 00:48:15 -0000
> From: "Mike Lacy" <mlacy@...>
>Subject: Re: Armoring a Pet
>
>There was a post by Brad ages ago before the first of the pet nerfs
>that you could give armor to your pet and it would help it out. I
>don't know if that's in fact true tho but I've been giving armor to
>my pets ever since.
>
>Maldain Demorte
>Lvl 43 Necromancer of E'ci
